# Week 8:

## 1. Finalised Topic

As an avid K-Drama watcher, I felt compelled to explore the topic of Korean Dramas, also known as K-Dramas, and answer the question of: **"What makes K-Drama popular?"**

Through a factors-type data-story, I will explain the popularity of K-Dramas by analysing and showcasing the specific factors that have contributed to its popularity.

## 2. Identified Data Sources

2.  Top 100 K-Dramas users have ranked on MyDramaList, featuring variables like Name, Year of Release, Aired Date, Aired On, Number of Episode, Network, Duration, Content Rating, Synopsis, Cast, Genre, Tags, Rank, Rating: *https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/chanoncharuchinda/top-100-korean-drama-mydramalist*

```{r, eval=TRUE, echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
top100kdrama_mydramalist <- read_csv("top100_kdrama_aug_2023.csv")
glimpse(top100kdrama_mydramalist)
```

3.  Information about dramas (Drama Name, Year, Synopsis, Genres, Tags, Director, Screen writer, Country ect) and user reviews (Ratings on the story, Acting cast, Music, Rewatch Value, Overall, Number of episodes watched etc) from Korea, Japan, and Thailand: *https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/chanoncharuchinda/thai-and-japanese-drama-vs-korean-drama-dominance?select=kor_user_reviews.csv*

```{r, eval=TRUE, echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
# korea drama datasets within package
kordrama <- read_csv("kor_drama.csv")
glimpse(kordrama)

kordrama_reviews <- read_csv("kor_user_reviews.csv")
glimpse(kordrama_reviews)

kordrama_actors <- read.csv("kor_kor_actors.csv")
glimpse(kordrama_actors)

# japanese drama datasets within package
japdrama <- read_csv("jap_drama.csv")
glimpse(japdrama)

japdrama_reviews <- read.csv("jap_user_reviews.csv")
glimpse(japdrama_reviews)

japdrama_actors <- read.csv("jap_user_reviews.csv")
glimpse(japdrama_actors)

#thailand drama datasets within package 
thaidrama <- read_csv("tha_drama.csv")
glimpse(thaidrama)

thaidrama_reviews <- read.csv("tha_drama.csv")
glimpse(thaidrama_reviews)

thaidrama_actors <- read.csv("tha_tha_actors.csv")
glimpse(thaidrama_actors)
```

